sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form
        ref="form"
        v-model="valid">
        <v-dialog
            v-model="dialog"
            @click:outside="closeDialog()"
            @input="$emit('input', $event)">
            <v-card flat outlined class="mt-2 rounded-0">
                <v-card-title>
                    {{ isEdit ? "Edit Plan Details" : "Enter New Plan Details" }}
                </v-card-title>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="plan.name"
                        label="Plan Name"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-text-field>

                </v-card-text>
                <v-card-text>
                    <v-textarea
                        v-model="plan.description"
                        label="Plan Description"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        dense
                        class="rounded-0"
                        outlined>
                    </v-textarea>
                </v-card-text>

                <v-dialog
                    v-model="deleteDialog"
                    :max-width="options.width"
                    :style="{ zIndex: options.zIndex }">
                    <v-card>
                        <v-toolbar
                            dark
                            :color="options.color"
                            dense
                            flat>
                            <v-toolbar-title
                                class="body-2 font-weight-bold">
                                {{ title }}
                            </v-toolbar-title>
                        </v-toolbar>
                        <v-card-text
                            v-show="!!message"
                            v-html="message"
                            class="pa-4">
                        </v-card-text>

                        <v-btn
                            class="rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                            color="error"
                            dark
                            outlined>
                            Confirm Delete
                        </v-btn>
                    </v-card>
                </v-dialog>

                <v-card-actions>
                    <v-btn
                        class="ml-2 mr-3 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        @click="closeDialog()">
                        Copy
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        class="error rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        @click="deleteCheck()">
                        Delete
                    </v-btn>

                    <v-spacer></v-spacer>
                    <v-btn
                        class="mr-3 rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        light
                        depressed
                        @click="closeDialog()">
                        Cancel
                    </v-btn>
                    <v-btn
                        class="mr-2 success rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                        depressed
                        :disabled="!valid"
                        @click="save">
                        Save
                    </v-btn>
                </v-card-actions>
            </v-card>

        </v-dialog>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PlanEditDialog',
    props: {
        plan: Object,
        dialog: Boolean,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
            deleteDialog: false,
            resolve: null,
            reject: null,
            message: "bob",
            title: null,
            options: {
                color: "grey lighten-3",
                width: 400,
                zIndex: 200,
                noconfirm: false,
            },
            rules: {
                required: value => !!value || 'Required.',
            }
        }
    },
    computed: {
        isEdit() {
            return this.plan.id > -1 ? true : false
        }
    },
    methods: {
        save() {
            this.$emit("save", this.plan)
        },
        deleteCheck() {
            this.deleteDialog = true
            // this.$emit("delete", this.plan)
        },
        closeDialog() {
            this.$emit("close-dialog")
        },
    },
    updated() {
        this.$refs.form.resetValidation()
    }
}
</script>
